TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CLGeocodeCompletionHandler(CLPlacemark[] placemarks, NSError error);
.class public auto ansi sealed CLGeocodeCompletionHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: Returns null on error, otherwise the list of placemark locations. Typically one, but could be more than one if the location is known by multiple names.
Docs.summary: A delegate that is the completionHandler in calls to .
